name: Non Compos Mentis
overview: The game is an empty checkerboard and a box full of irregular coloured shapes. You can move and rotate the shapes to fit anywhere to the board, and basically you have to fill a set portion of the screen before the timer runs out. It can be said that this is a kind of Tetris - although fairly original. This game was included with Your Sinclair Magazine issue 76: Magnificent Seven covertape.
